channel.title: Need help editing a 508
channel.description:
Hello,
I am FusionLord and i have had a 317 server and i love it but i want to upgrade to a 508. I have downloaded a 508 source and a 508 client. The only thing is i have no clue how to edit it like globalobjects and npcs and other things if any one would be kind enough to point me in the right direction that'd be great.
~FusionLord

item.title: Need help editing a 508
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Your other topic:

Hello,

I am FusionLord and i have had a 317 server and i love it but i want to up grade to a 508. the only thing is i have no clue how to edit it like globalobjects and npcs and other things if any one would be kind enough to point me in the right direction that’d be great.

~FusionLord

You took out about 2 words.

Read full topic
